name: Blingy Lite
description:
Here's a free version of the popular game Blingy. It's not like your ordinary bubble popping game. It includes five levels with increasing difficulty, realtime physics action, and accelerometer tilt control. Check out the desktop version at WebGames3D.com.

Full version of Blingy includes:
- Four special gadgets
Diamond - Destroys all of same color.
Rain - Deactivates torches for 10 seconds.
Bomb - Destroys all within range.
Randomizer - Randomizes all ball colors.

- World highscores.
- Local highscores.
- Customize backgrounds.
- Customize balls.
- Music.
- Longer play.
